fi.tuni.tamk.tiko.tiko2a

Class PlayMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tuni.tamk.tiko.tiko2a.PlayMain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class PlayMain
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    This class is used to show the player what he chose on the Play1 and Play2 screens. Also this uses the information of these mentioned screens to choose the background-set that is to be used.

      • selectBackGround

        private void selectBackGround()
        This is used to choose the background. It is an integer on the main game object that the other classes then use.

      • selectParts

        private void selectParts(int first,
                         int second)
        This method is used to generate a more natural looking sentences. (These are the choice sentences)
        Parameters:
        first - The first choice as integer
        second - The second choice as integer
